Name: In-Depth Reviews
Tagline: Reviews that ask better questions
Description: In-Depth Reviews capture what real makers and users think about the tools they rely on. Each review highlights the best and worst features, answers product-specific questions, and includes what the reviewer built using the product.

Name: Nimo
Tagline: An Intelligent Canvas that goes far Beyond your Browser
Description: End your AI app chaos with a canvas that connects your everyday apps and tools. Replace tabs with context-rich AI Cards. Generate Dynamic Apps from Gmail,Sheets,Notion and more. Chat with your apps-get work done. It's your living, connected, cohesive workspace

Name: AI-Powered Markdown/Text Editor
Tagline: Experience the joy and speed of pure text, with AI copilot
Description: Write effortlessly with Markdown Editor. Notion-style slash commands, @ai calling out writing assistant instantly, distraction-free interface. Generate, polish text with ease. One Click to Convert to Slides, or Spark New Ideas on an FunBlocks AI Canvas.

Name: Xano 2.0
Tagline: A full backend in minutes with AI, visual dev, and code.
Description: Meet Xano 2.0: The only backend that delivers the speed of AI, the clarity of visual development, and the control of code—all in one place, always in sync. Build production-grade apps in minutes, and deploy and run on secure, scalable infrastructure.

Name: Migma AI
Tagline: Lovable for Email
Description: Just say "Create a Halloween email" and get an on-brand email, in multiple languages, fully responsive and compatible with outlook and major clients. Convert Figma to Email. Connect to Shopify. Test on actual devices. Export to HubSpot, Klaviyo, MailChimp.

Name: UI Bakery App Agent
Tagline: Secure internal apps powered by your API or DB
Description: Build custom business apps on top of YOUR data faster than ever. Invite your team and assign custom permissions to collaborate securely. Deploy using a single click and access source code when needed.

Name: Composite
Tagline: Autopilot for your browser; it clicks, types, & navigates
Description: Composite is the best way to get work done in your browser. Cmd + Shift + Space on any website.

Name: Cosine VS Code Extension
Tagline: The AI teammate for your editor
Topics: Developer Tools, Artificial Intelligence, Vibe coding
Description: Cosine for VS Code brings our AI coding agent to your editor. It writes/refactors/tests code, and executes multi-step edits. Using our CLI as the bridge, build with the full power of our agentic workflow. A disciplined teammate that works where you code.

Name: Free Web Analytics by Crazy Egg
Tagline: Real-time traffic reporting with proactive AI analysis
Description: Monitor website traffic in a glance. Access segmented reports in a click. AI Analysis that proactively finds marketing opportunities for you.

Name: Twigg
Tagline: Git for LLMs - a Context Management Tool
Description: We built "Git for LLMs" - an improved LLM interface. Twigg is a context management tool designed for long term projects. We provide an interactive tree diagram of your entire LLM conversation, and complete control over the context you send to an LLM.

Name: Trigger.dev v4
Tagline: Build and deploy fully‑managed AI agents and workflows
Topics: API, Open Source, Developer Tools, GitHub
Description: Trigger.dev is the open source platform for building AI workflows in TypeScript. Long-running tasks with retries, queues, observability, and elastic scaling. Begin for free, invite your team, and scale without limits.

Name: Hacktivate
Tagline: A capture-the-flag game teaching real cybersecurity skills
Description: Hacktivate is a safe, gamified way for students to learn real cybersecurity skills through interactive hacking challenges, using iPhone, iPad, or Mac. Created by an indie developer to make computer science education more fun!

Name: Julius Slack Agent
Tagline: AI Data Scientist giving insights directly in Slack
Description: We just launched our Slack Agent. Now you can directly interface with Julius within your company's Slack workspace. Julius connects to your company's data sources, and automatically sources insights for your team.

Name: FinKitty
Tagline: Your finance pet that cheers every smart money move
Description: Finkitty is a fun, gamified app that helps you crush debt and build savings. Team up with friends in "Pods" to tackle finances together. Level up your "Cash Shield" and watch your debt monster shrink. It makes finance social and rewarding.

Name: Plexe
Tagline: Build and deploy ML models in English
Description: Plexe automates the full ML lifecycle from messy data to deployable models. Run 50 plus diagnostic tests, detect failure modes, and generate insights, dashboards and models using plain English. No notebooks. No guesswork. Just results.

Name: Soul Couple Game
Tagline: Strengthen your bond with fun, deep & playful questions
Description: Soul Couple Game is a fun question-based app for couples to connect, laugh, and discover new things about each other. Perfect for date nights, road trips, or just daily bonding. Available now on iOS!

Name: Context Sync
Tagline: Persistent AI memory across Claude Desktop & Cursor IDE
Topics: Open Source, Developer Tools, GitHub, Vibe coding
Description: The first MCP server syncing AI context across Claude Desktop & Cursor IDE. Never lose conversations, decisions, or project state to context window limit again. Includes todo management, code analysis, git integration & 50+ tools. 100% local & open source.

Name: Lead Magnet Pilot
Tagline: Automate lead magnets on LinkedIn
Description: Turn every LinkedIn comment into a qualified lead. Automatically deliver lead magnets via DM, accept connections, and follow up—all on autopilot while you focus on growing your business.

Name: PostFast
Tagline: Your social media assistant for growth. Schedule everywhere!
Description: PostFast is your social media assistant. It helps you schedule and automate (API access) your social media posts across Facebook, Instagram, Threads, X, LinkedIn, TikTok, and YouTube. Settings per platform, such as stories, reels, communities, and more!

Name: Digital Self by Fiction
Tagline: An AI model of you. Trained on your voice and style.
Description: An AI model of you that handles conversations in your voice.
